entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:43 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:40 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -24.3°C
Wind: S 34 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing late this morning. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Blizzard developing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
